name: Not a third
description:
A story-driver RPG made with the help of the RPG Unity course by gamedev.tv on udemy.

Controls:

  • Right mouse - Hold to rotate camera
  • Left mouse - Click to move/interact
  • Scroll whell - Zoom in/out
  • R - Reset level
  • F1 - Load level 1
  • F2 - Load level 2
